content-introduce: Travelook is a traveltech company in Vietnam. We are developing travel solutions for the hospitality & travel industry in
content-vision: Become an innovative & leading traveltech company in Vietnam with global network.
mission-content: Distribute Vietnam travel products to the world.
first-content-Travel-Wholesale-Deals: We help travel suppliers to distribute their digital travel products to both local & global network.
second-content-Travel-Wholesale-Deals: We wish to cooperate with travel merchants such as
blue-secont-content-Travel-Wholesale-Dea: Hotels & Resorts, Restaurants, Amusement & Theme Parks, Tours Suppliers...
after-blue-secont-content-Travel-Wholesa: to develop travel product for inbound & outbound travellers.
first-content-Cross-Border-Payment: We provide the unique payment solution for travel merchants to encourage inbound travellers to buy & pay with ease and spend more at the destination.
second-content-Cross-Border-Payment: Travelook would like to cooperate with travel merchants such as
after-blue-secont-content-Cross-Border-P: to implement the cross border payment solution at the destination. We will together attract more inbound travellers coming to Vietnam and spend more at the destination.
first-content-Buy-Now-Pay-Later: Provide finance solution to stimulate post-covid travel demand with fintech solution for tourism:
second-content-Buy-Now-Pay-Later: We wish to collaborate with travel companies and the local tourism department to implement this solution at the destinations to stimulate the travel demand after Covid-19.
content-Cross-Border-Payment: Solving the problem of international payment for Vietnam tourism.
content-Global-Distribution: Enable to distribute Vietnam travel products to global distribution network
content-advance: Travelook would like to cooperate with travel merchants such as Hotels & Resorts, Restaurants, Amusement & Theme Parks, Tours Operator, DMCs, Travel Agencies… to promote the solutions to travel consumers in order to stimulate the travel demand and attract more inbound travellers to Vietnam destination after Covid.
ward-address-company: An Loi Dong ward, District 2, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
